text: Vodafone UK offers fixed broadband services in the United Kingdom. Vodafone UK is a subsidiary of the multinational telecommunications company Vodafone Group Plc, which operates worldwide with a significant footprint in Europe, Asia, Middle East, and Africa.
AT&T?s fixed broadband service is offered as part of its  Wireline service which provides telephony, Internet access, and network integration.

Movistar is a fixed broadband service operated in Spain by Telefónica de Espa¤a, a subsidiary company of Telefónica, a multinational telecommunications company that also operates in many Latin American countries.
Orange France offers fixed line broadband service in France. Orange France is a subsidiary of Orange S.A. (formerly France T‚l‚com S.A.), a French multinational telecommunications corporation.

Airtel India offers fixed line broadband service across India. Airtel India is a subsidiary of Bharti Airtel Limited, a global telecommunications services company based in New Delhi that operates in 18 countries across South Asia and Africa.

Etisalat UAE offers fixed line broadband service in the United Arab Emirates. Etisalat UAE is a subsidiary of Emirates Telecommunications Corporation, a multinational UAE based telecommunications services provider.

Ooredoo Qatar offers fixed-line broadband services in Qatar. It is a subsidiary of Ooredoo Q.S.C. (formerly Qtel), an international telecommunications company headquartered in Doha, Qatar with operations across the Middle East, North Africa, and Asia.
